CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1946, pg. 1, reads: "...[ill.] Lucky Veterans and their families moved into the new [...] at McKinley Park Monday afternoon, after a colorful celebration attended by Mayor David L. Lawrence, Housing Administrator [...] Klein, and a number of other city officials. These homes were the first of the 750 veterans' temporary housing unites being constructed throughout the city to be readied for occupancy.  The photos, left to right,...In the next photo, Mayor Lawrence presents the first key to Mrs. Nelson.  Also in picture are Mrs. Ruth Shiring and her son James, and Administrator Klein...- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mayor David L. Lawrence handing key to Ruth Shiring with son James, and Mr. Klein wearing dark suit, standing on right, looking on, standing front of doorway, possibly McKinley Park, flanked by flag banners
